name: Happy Fish - Baby Aquarium
description:
Happy fish peppe Lee is happy mrs chicken Molly and happy mr chicken Roger's pet fish. She is growing up and can lay different colors of eggs after eating different colors of candies. The colorful fishes will come out from their eggs. It's your tap tap aquarium. You can change it to your Fishdom.

· Touch Screen to feed happy fish Peppe Lee.
· Happy fish will lay egg after eating 5 candies. The color of the egg is same to the candies.
· Little fish will come out from its egg. The color of the fish is same to the egg.
· Touch the coral at the right-bottom of the screen can change the color of candy.
· Touch the little fish and then the little fish will swim out of the aquarium.

Now, build your own beautiful aquarium and fishdom. Let's enjoy Feed Happy Fish - Little Aquarium. Tap tap, and have fun!
